desc: Great Lakes Refill Company Sarnia serves Sarnia Lambton with reduced waste, bulk food and house hold items. Find grocery, beauty, home supplies, lifestyle items, and more at our location in downtown Sarnia, Ontario. A Short walk from the St Clair River and centrally located.

layout.text: We have over 1,000 products. We carry affordable bulk pantry staples and fridge & freezer items to home & personal care products - all package free.
